name: Sister of the Sea
description:
Sister of the Sea

Sister of the Sea is a visual Novel, Inspired by the real life Anne Bonny, a pirate who operated in the Caribbean sea. It is a take on her life exploring the idea of "What if she never met Calico Jack, and became a pirate in her own right?"

Players make narrative choices, Deciding what course of action Bonny takes. Will she be a benevolent rascal of the sea, or a vicious bloodthirsty criminal? Thats entirely up to you.

Built in the Ren'Py engine, using dialogue and art of our own creation, you can download the first chapter today.
